content.prompt: The work shown was displayed

choices.label: in an annual public ceremony, where it was carried along a processional route
alongside a number of related works depicting similar figures
as a pendant worn with varied animal skins and feather headdresses
to greet visitors approaching a large palace complex with sacred shrines

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
